altername_name: SuperLite 1500 Series - Tenant Wars Alpha - SuperLite 1500 Version
name: Board Game Top Shop
overview: In Top Shop, you must be the first to reach a certain amount of money by building shops in different kinds of malls. You choose from an assortment of characters from humans, and talking cats to moving televisions. There are also random events like closing down shops or receiving money from other people. The game can go up to 6 players.
